co.janicek.core.math.RandomCore

type
class
Pseudo random number generator (PRNG) using a functional style.

Static Variables

private MINSTD(inline,null) : Float

(a primitive root modulo M31)

private MPM(inline,null) : Float

(a Mersenne prime M31) modulus constant = 2^31 - 1 = 0x7ffffffe

Static Methods

returns
Non deterministic random seed.
Make a non deterministic random seed using standard libraries.

public nextParkMiller31( seed : Int ) : Int

see
POLYGONAL - A HAXE LIBRARY FOR GAME DEVELOPERS
http://www.firstpr.com.au/dsp/rand31/rand31-park-miller-carta.cc.txt
Park-Miller random number generator.
A good Pseudo-Random Number Generator (PRNG).

A Park-Miller-Carta PRNG (pseudo random number generator).

Integer implementation, using only 32 bit integer maths and no divisions.

public stringToSeed( s : String ) : Int

Converts a string to a seed. Lets you use words as seeds.

public inline toBool( seed : Int ) : Bool

Returns a pseudo-random boolean value (coin flip).

public inline toFloat( seed : Int ) : Float

Returns the pseudo-random double value x in the range 0 <= x < 1.

public inline toFloatRange( seed : Int, min : Float, max : Float ) : Float

Returns a pseudo-random double value x in the range min <= x <= max.

public inline toIntRange( seed : Int, min : Int, max : Int ) : Int

Returns a pseudo-random integral value x in the range min <= x <= max.
